profile.description: I am currently finishing my degree as a Systems Analyst at ORT, and the truth is that I am passionate about software development and new technologies. My expectations are oriented to start working in a company that allows me to continue growing in the world of development and to gain new experiences. For my part, I want you to know that I always give my best, providing total commitment, responsibility and initiative when carrying out the tasks performed.

experience.first-job-description: Technologies used so far: UML, Java, .NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, GIT, VUE and Bootstrap.
experience.second-job-description: Testing Course carried out in Codo a Codo. Codo a Codo is a course carried out by the Government of the City of Buenos Aires in Argentina.
experience.last-job-description: For a few years I have been taking Udemy courses and looking for information in the official documentation of each language or new technology. I also like to watch YouTube channels to improve and acquire new concepts.
experience.hobbies-description: Traveling is one of the best things that can happen to me. Much more if it is to a place that does not know it! When I have some free time I like to visit a different town and enjoy the outdoors and its meals.
